#수식 1. Rate equation for different inhibition model types

##Competitive

$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{[S]}+K_m(\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)
$$ 

##Non-competitive 
$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{K_m(\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)+[S](\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i})\right)}
$$ 

##Uncompetitive 
$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{K_m+[S](\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)}
$$

##Mixed 
$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{K_m(\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)+[S](\left(1+\frac{[I]}{aK_i}\right)}
$$
